text: Tumi dekha na'ine ye, akasasamuhata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache se'i sakalo allahake'i chajadaha karae, arau surya, candra, naksatramandali, parbataraaji, brksalata, jira-jantu lagate bahuto manuhe'o chajadaha karae? Arau bahutarae prati sabyasta haiche sasti. Allahe yaka apamanita karae taka sanmanadata kono na'i; niscaya allaha yi iccha se'itorae karae
